title.rendered: How to hire a driver who you can trust, like your family?

content.rendered:
Hire a driver who is the right one for you. It is important.

Because your Car Driver is often like your family member.

Try Helpers Near Me today and find a car driver who you can trust.

HELPERS NEAR ME (HNM) helps you find & hire legally verified workers near you. The platform uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions. On the other end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to spread the platform’s accessibility to as many workers all over India as possible. 

Want to hire a driver who is right for you?

Life is complex for all of us.

There are always situations when you must rely on someone who can take care of the responsibilities in your absence.

So who is the one at your place?

No matter the situation, your car driver in almost every home often comes across as your best man Friday.

How much does a Driver cost? What is the right monthly salary or charge for hiring a Car Driver?

The monthly cost of hiring a Driver varies between ₹17,000 and ₹18,000, depending on the car to drive.

In some cases, the cost of a Driver goes as high as ₹22,000 to ₹25,000, especially if he’s driving an automatic luxury car or if he’s driving the car for an Expat.

(SOURCE – SalaryTracker)

Do you want to check the cost of a Driver? Try SalaryTracker. It is a free salary tracking tool for 100+ profiles of Workers near you.

Try putting yourself in any of the following situations:

  1. You have to attend your meeting, and you need someone to go to the airport to pick up your parents coming to your place from their home town.
  2. You are getting late at the office when someone needs to pick up your kids from their Karate class in the evening.
  3. Your car broke down while going to the office, and you must get it fixed immediately at the nearest service station.
  4. Your kid has to go to a special extra class after school, and you and your spouse are busy at work.
  5. Diwali is coming, and there are a lot of Diwali gifts that need to be delivered to your friends.’

Situations like these and similar others always make you rely on someone. 

And at those times, no one is better than your car driver, your best man Friday.

So when there’s such a high reliance on your car driver, why would you not explore all the options available and hire a driver who is the right one for your home?

Meet Helpers Near Me.

It is a platform where you can find & hire a driver from multiple permanent private car drivers around your location.

It solves the problem of finding & hiring a car driver permanently in the easiest possible way.

Even the charges are nominal – starting at ₹99 only, and you can connect with multiple car drivers & hire a driver you like from among a couple of options.

This choice ensures that you get a well-experienced car driver who understands the city well and fits your budget.

Here are 11 promising reasons why you should try Helpers Near Me when you want to hire a driver who you can trust & rely on:

1) It is Convenient, Easy & Organized

Helpers Near Me is an easier, simpler & better way to find & hire a driver near you.

Five minutes and just a few taps are all it takes to find & hire a driver at Helpers Near Me.

Finding and hiring the right car driver was never as easy as organised earlier.

2) Meet professionally verified Car Drivers only

Helpers Near Me follows a 2/3 Step Verification Process for every Driver who joins the platform.

Everyone individual’s ID & Court/Criminal Records are checked in detail at the neighbouring District Courts around their addresses.

Learn more about the 2/3 Step Verification Process at Helpers Near Me.

Furthermore, you can also get your current car driver verified by this process.

It does not matter if he was hired from Helpers Near Me or elsewhere.

The primary objective is to help you get proper due diligence done for your car driver before hiring or soon after you’ve hired him.

3) Connect with Car Drivers near you

Helpers Near Me connects you with car drivers who might be actively looking for work when you are searching for them on the platform.

Because your car driver needs to report every morning and return to his home in the evening, proximity plays an important role.

Hence, the platform ensures you connect with nearby ones and hire a driver who fits your thoughts.

4) Speak to a couple of Car Drivers at a time

If available, the Helpers Near Me connects you with multiple Car Drivers near you, not just one or two.

Who doesn’t prefer choices, more so when you need to find the right car driver for yourself?

Moreover, when you want to hire a driver permanently, you would always want to meet with a few and try the shortlisted ones before deciding who to hire.

5) Find & Hire a Driver at a nominal fee only

With Helpers Near Me, you can connect with multiple car drivers at a starting fee of ₹99.

There are no additional charges.

Except only when you want access to the car driver’s background verification report.

The background verification report is also available to you at a nominal fee of just ₹199/-

So, technically, the entire transaction happens at a nominal fee only.

6) Get the best-rated Car Drivers from a vast pool of Drivers

A unique rating system allows Helpers Near Me to connect you with the best car drivers around your search location.

This unique rating system at Helpers Near Me is one of a kind.

The Rating System is designed on a complex algorithm, ensuring you always connect with the best ones and hire a driver who suits your requirement.

7) Enables the Drivers to connect with you directly

Helpers Near Me supports Car Drivers & other workers in finding local work opportunities.

The platform does so by connecting the Drivers directly with you.

By connecting directly with you, he can decide and opt for the work out of his own will.

No one influences his decision.

Furthermore, the Driver gets to decide the salary he wants to work.

In turn, this process helps him take control of his life and his source of income.

The Drivers (& other workers) join Helpers Near Me willingly and free of cost.

8) There are no middlemen & commissions in between when you hire a Driver

With Helpers Near Me, you connect with the Car Drivers directly, there are no middlemen & commissions in between.

It is a simple & straightforward digital platform that connects you and the car drivers so you connect and care for each other’s requirements.

9) The Car Driver gets to earn his full salary

Every driver who gets hired through Helpers Near Me gets an opportunity in his life to earn his full salary.

He gets all that he earns without having to pay commissions to someone else in between.

10) Safe & Secure Payment when you want to hire a Driver

Every transaction processed at Helpers Near Me goes through recognised payment gateways like Paytm and Cashfree.

Your details are entirely secured & protected against any unauthorized online transactions.

11) Customer-friendly 100% Refund Policy

Helpers Near Me follows an excellent, Customer-friendly 100% Refund Policy.

Every transaction you go through here comes with an assurance of helping you find & hire a Car Driver or other workers you might want to search on the platform.

For genuine reasons, the Helpers Near Me refunds are processed without questions.

Learn more about the Customer-Friendly 100% Refund Policy at Helpers Near Me.

Imagine all the convenience Helpers Near Me brings if you want to hire a driver who you can trust.

This comfort solves all the trouble you had to take otherwise to find a Car Driver.

So, next time you hire a Car Driver, try Helpers Near Me.

Helpers Near Me is the easiest way to find & hire a Driver.

Along with Drivers, Helpers Near Me has many other workers registered on its platform who work at Homes, Offices & Small Businesses. Like Cooks, Drivers, Babysitters, Security Guards, and Beauticians for your Parlour

Helpers Near Me uses technology and a lot of groundwork to help you connect directly with workers without any middlemen or commissions.

On one end, HNM helps the underprivileged workers of India find local employment, free of cost, directly from nearby employers like yourself. On the other, the digital infrastructure built around HNM makes it easy, quick, reliable & affordable for anyone to find & hire 100+ profiles of nearby workers.

With a vision to end poverty, forced labour, worker exploitation, and human trafficking, HNM is working towards building an unbiased and inclusive digital ecosystem where the underprivileged workforce of India can join the platform easily and access local employment free of cost, with or without smartphones.

HNM believes having enough local employment opportunities allows the workers to find a better working environment, better salaries and a chance to improve their and their families’ quality of life.

From time to time, HNM also engages with Government bodies and NGOs to make the platform accessible to as many workers in India as possible.
